title: How do I clean my Talkband B1?
answer:
You can use damp tissues or cloth to clean your B1 and thenuse dry cloth or tissues to dry it up.

Note the following when cleaning your B1:

  • Do not use any chemical cleaning agents.
  • Cleanyour headset and wrist band separately. Avoid immersing your B1 for a longtime.


Residual water on themicrophone or earphone may affect your call quality. Use tissues to absorb thewater.
